verses.verse: וַיְדַבֵּ֣ר <S%H1696><s%> also spake יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3069><s%> God אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to יְהוֹשֻׁ֖עַ <S%H3091><s%> unto Joshua לֵאמֹֽר׃ <S%H559><s%> saying

דַּבֵּ֛ר <S%H1696><s%> Speak אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to בְּנֵ֥י <S%H1121><s%> to the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel לֵאמֹ֑ר <S%H559><s%> saying תְּנ֤וּ <S%H5414><s%> Appoint out לָכֶם֙ אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> עָרֵ֣י <S%H5892><s%> for you cities הַמִּקְלָ֔ט <S%H4733><s%> of refuge אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> of which דִּבַּ֥רְתִּי <S%H1696><s%> whereof I spake אֲלֵיכֶ֖ם <S%H413><s%> to you בְּיַד־ <S%H3027><s%> unto you by the hand מֹשֶֽׁה׃ <S%H4872><s%> of Moses

לָנ֥וּס <S%H5127><s%> may flee שָׁ֙מָּה֙ <S%H8033><s%> there רוֹצֵ֔חַ <S%H7523><s%> That the slayer מַכֵּה־ <S%H5221><s%> that killeth נֶ֥פֶשׁ <S%H5315><s%> [any] person בִּשְׁגָגָ֖ה <S%H7684><s%> unawares בִּבְלִי־ <S%H1097><s%> without דָ֑עַת <S%H1847><s%> [and] unwittingly וְהָי֤וּ <S%H1961><s%> shall become לָכֶם֙ לְמִקְלָ֔ט <S%H4733><s%> thither and they shall be your refuge מִגֹּאֵ֖ל <S%H1350><s%> from the avenger הַדָּֽם׃ <S%H1818><s%> of blood

וְנָ֞ס <S%H5127><s%> And when he that doth flee אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to אַחַ֣ת ׀ <S%H259><s%> unto one מֵהֶעָרִ֣ים <S%H5892><s%> of those cities הָאֵ֗לֶּה <S%H428><s%> of these וְעָמַד֙ <S%H5975><s%> shall stand פֶּ֚תַח <S%H6607><s%> at the entering שַׁ֣עַר <S%H8179><s%> of the gate הָעִ֔יר <S%H5892><s%> of the city וְדִבֶּ֛ר <S%H1696><s%> and shall declare בְּאָזְנֵ֛י <S%H241><s%> in the ears זִקְנֵ֥י־ <S%H2205><s%> of the elders הָעִֽיר <S%H5892><s%> of that city הַהִ֖יא <S%H1931><s%> he אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> דְּבָרָ֑יו <S%H1697><s%> his cause וְאָסְפ֨וּ <S%H622><s%> they shall take אֹת֤וֹ <S%H853><s%> הָעִ֙ירָה֙ <S%H5892><s%> him into the city אֲלֵיהֶ֔ם <S%H413><s%> to וְנָתְנוּ־ <S%H5414><s%> unto them and give ל֥וֹ מָק֖וֹם <S%H4725><s%> him a place וְיָשַׁ֥ב <S%H3427><s%> that he may dwell עִמָּֽם׃ <S%H5973><s%> among

וְכִ֨י <S%H3588><s%> now if יִרְדֹּ֜ף <S%H7291><s%> pursue גֹּאֵ֤ל <S%H1350><s%> And if the avenger הַדָּם֙ <S%H1818><s%> of blood אַֽחֲרָ֔יו <S%H310><s%> after וְלֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> shall not יַסְגִּ֥רוּ <S%H5462><s%> him then they shall not deliver אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הָרֹצֵ֖חַ <S%H7523><s%> the slayer בְּיָד֑וֹ <S%H3027><s%> up into his hand כִּ֤י <S%H3588><s%> because בִבְלִי־ <S%H1097><s%> without דַ֙עַת֙ <S%H1847><s%> premeditation הִכָּ֣ה <S%H5221><s%> because he smote אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> רֵעֵ֔הוּ <S%H7453><s%> his neighbour וְלֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> and did not שֹׂנֵ֥א <S%H8130><s%> and hated ה֛וּא <S%H1931><s%> he ל֖וֹ מִתְּמ֥וֹל <S%H8543><s%> before שִׁלְשֽׁוֹם׃ <S%H8032><s%> before that time

וְיָשַׁ֣ב ׀ <S%H3427><s%> And he shall dwell בָּעִ֣יר <S%H5892><s%> in that city הַהִ֗יא <S%H1931><s%> he עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> until עָמְד֞וֹ <S%H5975><s%> until he stand לִפְנֵ֤י <S%H6440><s%> before הָֽעֵדָה֙ <S%H5712><s%> the congregation לַמִּשְׁפָּ֔ט <S%H4941><s%> for judgment עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> until מוֹת֙ <S%H4194><s%> [and] until the death הַכֹּהֵ֣ן <S%H3548><s%> priest הַגָּד֔וֹל <S%H1419><s%> of the high אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> that יִהְיֶ֖ה <S%H1961><s%> become בַּיָּמִ֣ים <S%H3117><s%> shall be in those days הָהֵ֑ם <S%H1992><s%> those אָ֣ז ׀ <S%H227><s%> Then יָשׁ֣וּב <S%H7725><s%> return הָרוֹצֵ֗חַ <S%H7523><s%> then shall the slayer וּבָ֤א <S%H935><s%> and come אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to his עִירוֹ֙ <S%H5892><s%> unto his own city וְאֶל־ <S%H413><s%> and to בֵּית֔וֹ <S%H1004><s%> and unto his own house אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to הָעִ֖יר <S%H5892><s%> unto the city אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> which נָ֥ס <S%H5127><s%> from whence he fled מִשָּֽׁם׃ <S%H8033><s%> they

וַיַּקְדִּ֜שׁוּ <S%H6942><s%> And they appointed אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> קֶ֤דֶשׁ <S%H6943><s%> Kedesh בַּגָּלִיל֙ <S%H1551><s%> in Galilee בְּהַ֣ר <S%H2022><s%> in mount נַפְתָּלִ֔י <S%H5321><s%> Naphtali וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> שְׁכֶ֖ם <S%H7927><s%> and Shechem בְּהַ֣ר <S%H2022><s%> in mount אֶפְרָ֑יִם <S%H669><s%> Ephraim וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> קִרְיַ֥ת אַרְבַּ֛ע <S%H7153><s%> and Kirjatharba הִ֥יא <S%H1931><s%> he חֶבְר֖וֹן <S%H2275><s%> which [is] Hebron בְּהַ֥ר <S%H2022><s%> in the mountain יְהוּדָֽה׃ <S%H3063><s%> of Judah

וּמֵעֵ֜בֶר <S%H5676><s%> And on the other side לְיַרְדֵּ֤ן <S%H3383><s%> Jordan יְרִיחוֹ֙ <S%H3405><s%> by Jericho מִזְרָ֔חָה <S%H4217><s%> eastward נָתְנ֞וּ <S%H5414><s%> they assigned אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> בֶּ֧צֶר <S%H1221><s%> Bezer בַּמִּדְבָּ֛ר <S%H4057><s%> in the wilderness בַּמִּישֹׁ֖ר <S%H4334><s%> upon the plain מִמַּטֵּ֣ה <S%H4294><s%> out of the tribe רְאוּבֵ֑ן <S%H7205><s%> of Reuben וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> רָאמֹ֤ת <S%H7216><s%> and Ramoth בַּגִּלְעָד֙ <S%H1568><s%> in Gilead מִמַּטֵּה־ <S%H4294><s%> out of the tribe גָ֔ד <S%H1410><s%> of Gad וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> [גָּלֹון כ] (גֹּולָ֥ן <S%H1474><s%> Golan ק) בַּבָּשָׁ֖ן <S%H1316><s%> in Bashan מִמַּטֵּ֥ה <S%H4294><s%> out of the tribe מְנַשֶּֽׁה׃ <S%H4519><s%> of Manasseh

אֵ֣לֶּה <S%H428><s%> These הָיוּ֩ <S%H1961><s%> become עָרֵ֨י <S%H5892><s%> These were the cities הַמּֽוּעָדָ֜ה <S%H4152><s%> appointed לְכֹ֣ל ׀ <S%H3605><s%> for all בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> for all the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֗ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel וְלַגֵּר֙ <S%H1616><s%> and for the stranger הַגָּ֣ר <S%H1481><s%> that sojourneth בְּתוֹכָ֔ם <S%H8432><s%> among לָנ֣וּס <S%H5127><s%> might flee שָׁ֔מָּה <S%H8033><s%> there כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> whoever מַכֵּה־ <S%H5221><s%> them that whosoever killeth נֶ֖פֶשׁ <S%H5315><s%> [any] person בִּשְׁגָגָ֑ה <S%H7684><s%> at unawares וְלֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> and not יָמ֗וּת <S%H4191><s%> thither and not die בְּיַד֙ <S%H3027><s%> by the hand גֹּאֵ֣ל <S%H1350><s%> of the avenger הַדָּ֔ם <S%H1818><s%> of blood עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> until עָמְד֖וֹ <S%H5975><s%> until he stood לִפְנֵ֥י <S%H6440><s%> before הָעֵדָֽה׃ <S%H5712><s%> the congregation פ
